title: Bought Pixel 3XL with error mesage at launch, should I return it?
content:
Hey everybody, 

In advance, sorry for my English I am French. 

Last Saturday I bought a Pixel 3XL and when I launch I got the following message (see attached picture). 

I tried to go back to the vendor but they told me that everything was alright and that I should relock myself the bootloader or even leave it like that. 

My concern is about warranty, if I try to fix it myself; is it possible that I break/lose the manufacturer's warranty ? 

And seeing this message makes me think that this phone might be refurbished and sold as new...

Do you guys have any ideas ? 

Thank you in advance for your messages and have a nice day !
